an7.64:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, dhamma sapattakanta sapattakarana kodhanam agacchanti itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evam icchati:
an7.64:1.6: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vannavataya nandati.
an7.64:1.7: Kodhanoyam, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhabhibhuto kodhapareto, kincapi so hoti sunhato suvilitto kappitakesamassu odatavatthavasano;
an7.64:1.8: atha kho so dubbannova hoti kodhabhibhuto.
an7.64:1.9: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakarano kodhanam agacchati itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evam icchati:
an7.64:2.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sukhaseyyaya nandati.
an7.64:2.5: Kodhanoyam, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhabhibhuto kodhapareto, kincapi so pallanke seti gonakatthate patalikatthate kadalimigapavarapaccattharane sauttaracchade ubhatolohitakupadhane;
an7.64:2.6: atha kho so dukkhanneva seti kodhabhibhuto.
an7.64:2.7: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakarano kodhanam agacchati itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evam icchati:
an7.64:3.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa pacuratthataya nandati.
an7.64:3.5: Kodhanoyam, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhabhibhuto kodhapareto, anatthampi gahetva ‘attho me gahito’ti mannati, atthampi gahetva ‘anattho me gahito’ti mannati.
an7.64:3.6: Tassime dhamma annamannam vipaccanika gahita digharattam ahitaya dukkhaya samvattanti kodhabhibhutassa.
an7.64:3.7: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakarano kodhanam agacchati itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evam icchati:
an7.64:4.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa bhogavataya nandati.
an7.64:4.5: Kodhanassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa kodhabhibhutassa kodhaparetassa, yepissa te honti bhoga utthanaviriyadhigata bahabalaparicita sedavakkhitta dhammika dhammaladdha, tepi rajano rajakosam pavesenti kodhabhibhutassa.
an7.64:4.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakarano kodhanam agacchati itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evam icchati:
an7.64:5.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa yasavataya nandati.
an7.64:5.5: Kodhanoyam, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhabhibhuto kodhapareto, yopissa so hoti yaso appamadadhigato, tamhapi dhamsati kodhabhibhuto.
an7.64:5.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, pancamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakarano kodhanam agacchati itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evam icchati:
an7.64:6.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa mittavataya nandati.
an7.64:6.5: Kodhanam, bhikkhave, purisapuggalam kodhabhibhutam kodhaparetam, yepissa te honti mittamacca natisalohita, tepi araka parivajjanti kodhabhibhutam.
an7.64:6.6: Ayam, bhikkhave, chattho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakarano kodhanam agacchati itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evam icchati:
an7.64:7.2: ‘aho vatayam kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya’ti.
an7.64:7.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamane nandati.
an7.64:7.5: Kodhanoyam, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhabhibhuto kodhapareto kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an7.64:7.7: kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati kodhabhibhuto.
an7.64:7.8: Ayam, bhikkhave, sattamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakarano kodhanam agacchati itthim va purisam va.
an7.64:8.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhamma sapattakanta sapattakarana kodhanam agacchanti itthim va purisam vati.
